titles.title: Retroactive Immunity Repeal Act

A bill to amend the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 to remove retroactive immunity protection for electronic communications service providers that participated in the Terrorist Surveillance Program and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/29/2009--Introduced. Retroactive Immunity Repeal Act - Amends the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 to repeal provisions relating to retroactive immunity protection for electronic communication service providers that participated in the Terrorist Surveillance Program.
